title: Plz read
body: My account got suspended somehow, i've spent more than $1000 on league and i cant log in anymore. It says that i have been sent an email but i haven't received any emails but yet it still says it has and im so sad and annoyed because i just bought the draven day pack bundle and now i cant play any of them because i cant log in :( if anyone can help me plz comment

replies.body:
Hey there,

Check your spam box in your email, sometimes certain providers may filter the automated ban emails as spam.

If you've still not received an email regarding your ban, feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for information regarding the reasoning behind your suspension.
